price: Kuma, a lõkacin da ãyari* ya bar (Masar) ubansa ya ce: "Lalle ne nĩ inã shãƙar iskar Yũsufu, bã dõmin kanã ƙaryata ni ba."
arabic: وَلَمَّا فَصَلَتِ ٱلۡعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمۡ إِنِّي لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَۖ لَوۡلَآ أَن تُفَنِّدُونِ
footnotes: * Yãƙũba da jĩkõkinsa. Yanã gaya musu, cewa yanã shãƙar ƙanshin Yũsufu, su kuma suna jingina shi ga ruɗewar tsũfa dõmin rabonsa da Yũsufu shħkara talãtin da biyar zuwa Arba'in.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walammā faṣalati al-ʿīru qāla abūhum innī la-ajidu rīḥa yūsufa lawlā an tufannidūni
translations: you think me weakened in mind
